We finance, build, own, and operate digital infrastructure across the Middle East and North Africa. Information and cyber security on internal systems is imperative, and TASC focuses on a single, centralized platform for business operations.

Fortuna AI partnered with Valere to create a platform that addresses the multifaceted challenges businesses encounter in navigating complex tax landscapes. Traditional tax planning methods often fall short due to manual processes, outdated techniques, and the overwhelming volume of evolving tax regulations. This project recognizes these challenges as significant barriers to effective tax strategy implementation. The platform leverages the power of AI to revolutionize tax planning by automating tasks, analyzing vast data sets, and generating customized strategies tailored to each business's unique circumstances. Businesses using Fortuna AI gain a competitive edge by minimizing tax liabilities, maximizing savings, and allocating resources more efficiently. By streamlining processes, providing accurate insights, and enabling proactive planning, Fortuna AI empowers businesses to thrive in an ever-changing economic environment.

Categories: alzheimers, biomedical research, data privacy, games, health tech, healthcare, research group
Description: We partnered with Johns Hopkins University Medical school (Kuchibhotla Lab) to combat Alzheimer’s disease. We helped doctors and scientists at JHU to design an application that allows Alzheimer’s patients to play “brain games” on a tablet or smartphone, all while bio-medical devices gather patients' biometrics. The web service compares the data from the patients biometrics in real time with the brain games results — to ultimately produce new Alzheimer’s data that is pivotal to finding a cure for this disease.  Due to the application’s success, JHU has received further funding from the University and has partnered with us to continuously add new features to the application over the next few years.

Description: The current manual process for invoice capture, verification, and accounting is time-consuming, error-prone, and frustrating for vendors and buyers. The lack of automation and standardized business rules results in invoice handling inconsistencies, leading to vendor payment delays and a poor customer experience. My team and I are integrating AI to allow vendors and buyers to streamline their invoice capture, verification, and payment processes. Computer vision is utilized to analyze the different fields of an invoice and determine where to send it based upon rules set by the organization; this is proven to reduce manual work and improve accuracy while enforcing standardized business rules.

Categories: QR scanning, bootstrap, classes, custom orders, html, inventory management, javascript, jquery, mobile/desktop, notifications, responsive webapp, text reminders, tracking capabilities
Description: RacquetPass is cutting-edge platform designed to liberate racquet service shops from tedious paperwork, providing an efficient solution for inventory management and payments. Redefining Customer Experience: RacquetPass offers players a seamless experience—simply scan the QR code on their racquet and effortlessly input contact details, racquet specifications, and string preferences. The hassle of waiting in long lines is eliminated as players conveniently submit their information and store their racquets with ease. Empowering Shops with Control: RacquetPass provides racquet service shops with unparalleled convenience, granting complete control over order management and inventory management. Scanning racquets marks them as in progress or completed, triggering automatic notifications to players for pick-up.The platform provides shops with a versatile panel for customization. Updating string inventory becomes a breeze with a master list, enabling one-click changes. Shops can add, edit, or delete string information and offer players additional purchasing options for grips, balls, and bumper guards. Scheduling pick-up times adds further flexibility for players. RacquetPass streamlines the entire process, allowing shops to handle current and completed racquet repair orders seamlessly. The platform’s user-friendly interface and innovative features redefine the racquet service industry, providing a win-win for both shops and players.Embark on a new era of racquet service efficiency with RacquetPass — where technology meets racquet sports for an unparalleled customer and business experience.
